title: Voscal
content: Hello! I'm Voscal. I like to create things like games, music, and art! This page is still in development, but you can find the currently added projects at the bottom of the page. Just click on the icons, and it will switch to a project! I’m still adding more daily, so make sure to bookmark the page and check back later for more projects! If you have any questions, feel free to shoot me an email at “contact(at)voscal.com.” It’s not a hyperlink to avoid spam. Thanks!
